channel.title: Posts on Jonathon Lacher
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jonathon Lacher

item.title: Day 1 trying the Kinesis Advantage 2
item.description: Why am I trying an ergo keyboard? Was starting to feel some mild hand pain, and I’ve never bought my own keyboard before, so this seemed like a good excuse to try something new.

item.title: Book notes: A Philosophy of Software Design, Chapters 1-3
item.description: This is the first in a series of posts of my notes on the book A Philosophy of Software Design by John Ousterhout.

item.title: Winter heating
item.description: We bought a house, it was built in the 1920s and the main floor uses hot water radiators as the primary heat source (boiler is a Weil-McLain CG-4).

item.title: Network debugging with MTR
item.description: I’ve been dealing with intermittent packet loss at my current home connection.

item.title: Why I don't listen to white noise (An ode to brown noise)
item.description: When I need to focus in a distracting or noisy environment, I use a combination of noise canceling headphones and brownian (brown) noise.

item.title: Where I get my weather forecasts
item.description: I’ve been an Android user for the last 10 years, and for the last 3-4 years I’ve been using the Dark Sky weather app.

item.title: Flickr's Camera Finder
item.description: It’s a temptation in photography to ascribe gear like an expensive camera body or a fast n’ sharp lense as the the reason great photos are great.

item.title: Podcasts I like
item.description: Pocket Casts (my preferred podcast player) says I’ve listened to 1038 hours of audio since 2015.

item.title: Mac window wrangling
item.description: I’ll admit that my experience with macOS/OSX only goes back a few years, but I was instantly frustrated with window management.

item.title: FCC broadband map
item.description: When I’m looking at property, one of the additional research steps I take is figuring out the available internet providers.

item.title: How I manage my Lightroom library
item.description: After I bought a mirrorless micro four thirds camera last year, I’ve entered the rabbit whole of media management.

item.title: Corporate Memphis
item.description: If you’re a Todoist user, you may have seen this image Even if you haven’t, the style may look familiar.

item.title: Craigslist search operators
item.description: I’m currently searching for a second vehicle and have been trolling Craigslist postings.

item.title: Sync your laptop and external monitor brightness
item.description: Since working from home, I’ve been using an external monitor more heavily.
